## Introduction

This Quarto notebook generates Julia-themed output.

## Details

The theme is based on the `default` theme and adds various custom formatting options.

### Font

The theme uses the [JuliaMono](https://juliamono.netlify.app/) font for monospace text and code. For all other text, the theme uses the [Barlow](https://tribby.com/fonts/barlow/) font.

### Colors

#### Code

Inline code looks like this `print("hello üåç")`.

<hr>

```{.julia}
print("hello üåç")
```
